SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.monome.pages
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  org.monome.pages.Configuration
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.sound.midi.Receiver
public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.sound.midi.Receiver

This object stores all configuration about all current monomes and pages. It also stores global options like Ableton OSC port selection and enabled MIDI devices.

Author:
Tom Dinchak

                                  int sizeX,
                                  int sizeY)
Called from GUI to add a new monome configuration.

Parameters:
prefix - The prefix of the monome (ie. /40h)
sizeX - The width of the monome (ie. 8 or 16)
sizeY - The height of the monome (ie. 8 or 16)
Returns:
The new monome's index

Returns:
